title: David Villa
summary: David Villa Sánchez (Spanish pronunciation: [daˈβið ˈbiʎa santʃeθ]; born 3 December 1981) is a Spanish retired professional footballer who played as a striker. Villa is regarded by pundits as one of the best forwards of his generation, and one of the best Spanish strikers of all time.[4][5][6] David is currently working as the Technical Advisor and Head of Global Football Operations of the Indian Super League club Odisha FC.[7]
